original: Eländer, Elis Hilding Gösta, notarie, Göteborg, f. 16/10/12 i Gbg av red. Elis E. o. Hilma Janson. G. 46 m. Sara Gustafsson. — Stud:ex. i Gbg 3-3, jur, kand. i Lund 38. Tingstjg. i Östbo o. Väs’tbo doms. 38-41, aus-kultanttjg. v. Gbgs rådhusr. 42, fiskal i Svea hovr. 43, sekr. i Nora doms. 43, not. v. Gbgs rådhusr. sed. 43. Lär. i hand:rätt v. Gbgs hand:inst. sed. 43. Ordf. i tax:nd i Gbg sed. 47.
translated: Elis Hilding Gösta Eländer was born on October 16th, 1912 in Gothenburg to editor Elis E. and Hilma Janson. He married Sara Gustafsson in 1946. Eländer completed his studies in Gothenburg in 1933, and received his law degree from Lund University in 1938. He served as a court clerk in Östbo and Västbo districts from 1938-1941, an apprentice clerk at the Gothenburg City Council in 1942, a fiscal at the Svea Court of Appeals in 1943, a secretary at the Nora district court in 1943, and a notary at the Gothenburg City Council since 1943. He taught commercial law at Gothenburg's School of Business from 1943. He has been chair of the tax commission in Gothenburg since 1947.

structured.name: Elis Hilding Gösta Eländer
